documentation.text:
@author The PRIVI Blockchain team
 @title Manages swap and withdraw of Ethers, ERC20 tokens and ERC721 tokens between Users and PRIVI platform

@notice  Transfer ether from sender address to contract address
 @dev     - Amount to be deposited must be greater than 0 ethers

attributes.text:
@author The PRIVI Blockchain team
 @title Manages swap and withdraw of Ethers, ERC20 tokens and ERC721 tokens between Users and PRIVI platform

@notice  Transfer ether from sender address to contract address
 @dev     - Amount to be deposited must be greater than 0 ethers

devdoc.author: The PRIVI Blockchain team

depositERC1155Token(string,address,uint2.details: - User must have TRANSFER_ROLE          - Token to be transferred must be already registered          - User has to approve first the amount to be transferred WITHIN the original ERC1155 token contract,          and not from this contract. Otherwise, transaction will always fail

params.to: Destination address to receive the tokens
params.tokenURI: Name of the token to be transferred

depositERC20Token(string,uint256).details: - Token to be transferred must be already registered          - User has to approve first the amount to be transferred WITHIN the original ERC20 token contract,          and not from this contract. Otherwise, transaction will always fail

params.amount: Amount of tokens to be transferred
params.tokenSymbol: Name of the token to be transferred

depositERC721Token(string,uint256).details: - User must have TRANSFER_ROLE          - Token to be transferred must be already registered          - User has to approve first the amount to be transferred WITHIN the original ERC721 token contract,          and not from this contract. Otherwise, transaction will always fail

params.tokenSymbol: Name of the token to be transferred

depositEther().details: - Amount to be deposited must be greater than 0 ethers

withdrawERC1155Token(string,address,uint.details: - User must have TRANSFER_ROLE          - PRIVI must have enough tokens to transfer them back to User

params.to: Destination address to receive the tokens
params.tokenURI: Name of the token to be transferred

withdrawERC20Token(string,address,uint25.details: - User must have TRANSFER_ROLE          - PRIVI must have enough tokens to transfer them back to User

params.amount: Amount of tokens to be transferred
params.to: Destination address to receive the tokens
params.tokenSymbol: Name of the token to be transferred

withdrawERC721Token(string,address,uint2.details: - User must have TRANSFER_ROLE          - PRIVI must have enough tokens to transfer them back to User

params.isPodMint: is it a withdraw from swap manager or is it minting new nft pod token
params.to: Destination address to receive the tokens
params.tokenSymbol: Name of the token to be transferred

withdrawEther(address,uint256).details: - Sender must have TRANSFER_ROLE          - Contract must have enough balance to do the transfer

params.amount: Amount of ether to be transferred
params.to: Destination address to receive the ether

devdoc.title: Manages swap and withdraw of Ethers, ERC20 tokens and ERC721 tokens between Users and PRIVI platform

depositERC1155Token(string,address,uint2.notice: Transfer ERC1155 token from sender address (User) to contract address (PRIVI)

depositERC20Token(string,uint256).notice: Transfer ERC20 token from sender address (User) to contract address (PRIVI)

depositERC721Token(string,uint256).notice: Transfer ERC721 token from sender address (User) to contract address (PRIVI)

depositEther().notice: Transfer ether from sender address to contract address

withdrawERC1155Token(string,address,uint.notice: Transfer ERC1155 token from contract address (PRIVI) to sender address (User)

withdrawERC20Token(string,address,uint25.notice: Transfer ERC20 token from contract address (PRIVI) to sender address (User)

withdrawERC721Token(string,address,uint2.notice: Transfer ERC721 token from contract address (PRIVI) to sender address (User)

withdrawEther(address,uint256).notice: Transfer ether from contract address to sender address
